participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, Liam enjoys deep conversations and exploring philosophical ideas.
participant_1.background: i like meditation. i've not spoken in three months. i quit my job to pursue my spirituality full time. i'm a buddhist.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Energetic and creative, Sophie loves to express herself through fashion and music. She is sociable and enjoys connecting with others over shared interests.
participant_2.background: i'm rather skinny as i like to stay in shape. i love wearing skinny jeans and leggings. i'm a blonde girl with really short hair. my favorite shirts are band shirts and ruffle sleeves. my favorite hobbies are listening to music and playing video games.
